/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a warm tone to the image. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
